## useRoyaltySettings() function

Get the royalty for an NFT program

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useRoyalty } from "@web3sdks/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { data: royalty, isLoading } = useRoyaltySettings(program);

  return <p>{royalty}</p>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useRoyaltySettings(
  program: RequiredParam<NFTCollection | NFTDrop>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult<number, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                              | Description                            |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| program   | RequiredParam&lt;NFTCollection &#124; NFTDrop&gt; | The NFT program to get the royalty for |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseQueryResult&lt;number, unknown&gt;
